co2Values.comment:
co2-calculation: CO2-value directly from reference 1 (1.47kg CO2e/kg) + reduction of shell weight. Assumption ratio of kernel weight is on average 0.6 

1.47/0.6 = 2.45 kg CO2e/kg calculation-process-documentation: 1. Country inventory Italy, but estimations for Spain and Turkey in study as well. Italy is the second largest produce of hazelnut worldwide (15%), Turkey is the largest (66%), US only contributes 4%. Study includes deforestation. FU = 1 kg of fresh mass product. Study till farm gate. Drying of hazelnut is included for sure, but probably not the peeling. 
2. If the ratio of kernel weight is less than 0.5, buyers may reject the produce.
